text: Rebecca Rittenhouse (born November 30, 1988) is an American actress. In the primetime soap opera Blood & Oil, she played Cody LeFever. She played Dr. Anna Ziev im the Hulu romantic comedy show The Mindy Project. Rittenhouse was born in Los Angeles, California. She was raised in Pasadena ==Filmography== ===Movies=== Year Title Role Notes 2011 Philadelphia, Ti Amo Veronica directed by Jeff AyarsLove in Philadelphia. Cornell University. 2011-10-31. title: Rebecca Rittenhouse
